thread.section_title: ZipRecruiter Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ZipRecruiter | ziprecruiter.com | 4 of 197
thread.title: Jamie Kelly

author: Jamie Kelly
title: Jamie Kelly
text:
ZipRecruiter helped me hire in a short timeframe when I felt I'd exhausted the candidate pool on other popular hiring sites. The influx of new, well-qualified candidates was immediate, and in less than 30 days with ZipRecruiter I'd filled my open roles.
When I ran into a technical error on the site Sarah in customer service was top notch in helping me resolve it quickly and painlessly.
I'll be reactivating my account as soon as I'm hiring again!
